name: Gluttonous
passiveSkills: Immune to Stop and Heal Block effects, including Silver and Innate effects
Each ally and enemy takes 300% Increased Damage for 1 turn if Crave effects, including Silver and Innate effects on are active on them at the start of battle and at the start of your turn
25% Chance to Permanently Increase All Stats, including Max HP, on self by +25% when you are healed
75% Chance to gain an Extra Turn if healed while at 50% HP or below
Heal all allies for 25% of your MAX HP and inflict Crave or Perfect Crave on each enemy for the duration of battle after every action.
